          <title>
            <string language="en">Evolution of three domains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung von drei Gebieten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évolution de trois domaines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evolução de três domínios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno sviluppo di tre settori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξέλιξη τριών δικτυακών γειτονιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evolución de tres dominios</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Animated explanation of the evolution of the three domains of life : Archea, Bacteria and Eukarya</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">domains</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Bacteria</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

Gebiete des Lebens: Archea, Bakterium und Eukarya</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explication animée de l'évolution des trois 
domaines de la vie : Archea, bactéries et Eukarya</string>
          </description>

domínios da vida: Archea, bactérias e Eukarya</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazione animata dello sviluppo dei tre settori
di vita: Archea, batteri ed Eukarya</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωντανεψοντη εξήγηση της εξέλιξης των τριών δικτυακών 
γειτονιών της ζωής: Archea, βακτηρίδια και Eukarya</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explicación animada de la evolución de los tres 
dominios de la vida: Archea, bacterias y Eukarya</string>
